price: 他们因为自己的罪恶而被淹死，遂堕入火狱，除安拉外他们没有获得援助者。
arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: mimmā khaṭīātihim ugh'riqū fa-ud'khilū nāran falam yajidū lahum min dūni al-lahi anṣāran
